article_title: Grooming Lounge: Boston men among most handsome in U.S.
article_text:
Written By Ben Ross Posted: 07/18/2015, 10:17am

GroomingLounge, a men’s hair care product website has recently named the cities with the most handsome men in the U.S., and Boston came up near the top of the list.

Boston was named the fourth most-handsome city, with Seattle, San Francisco, and Washington D.C. preceding Boston.

GroomingLounge based the findings on money spent on personal care services, personal care products, shaving needs, apparel per man and the fittest cities in the nation.

From the rankings:

article_metadata.description: A men's hair care company has named Boston as having some of the most handsome men in the U.S.
